text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires an explanation that the 'Stormont Brake' is a mechanism for the NI Assembly to control the continued application of EU regulations in its territory and is included in the Windsor Framework. The candidate answer explicitly states: 'This is the big political prize from Windsor Framework. Legal basis: Article 13(3a) and (3b) of the Protocol (inserted by Windsor Framework amendments)... What it actually does: - Gives the NI Assembly power to object to new or amended EU rules that would apply in NI under the Protocol'.
